channel.title: Cta on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Cta on Simba Tango

item.title: Hope for CTA, AMP, Audio Park reissues?
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ eerkmans Many CTA discs and others are available in Europe through the Austrian DJ Bernhard Gehberger. He recently went to Japan and met with the guys behind CTA, AMP and Audio Park. From his report from that trip, it seems like he is working on facilitating reissues of these out-of-print discs. Which would be of great benefit to the tango community if he pulls it through. Today they are both hard to get and expensive.

item.title: Quality of CTA bootlegs
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Usually, I don’t buy bootlegs, but when it comes to tango music, there is some material that is not available from the commercial releases like Reliquias, Tango Argentino etc. I always concentrated on the commercial releases, but now that I have most of the interesting material from these releases, I have moved on the the more exotic releases, like the Club Tango Argentino by Akihito Baba. They are unfortunately hard to get by, and several are out of print.
